§ 1709. Intervention by Attorney General Whenever a civil action is instituted under section 1706 of this title by an individual, the Attorney General may intervene in such action upon timely application. (Pub. L. 93–380, title II, § 210, Aug. 21, 1974, 88 Stat. 516.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective on and after sixtieth day after Aug. 21, 1974, see section 2(c) of Pub. L. 93–380, set out as a note under section 1221–1 of this title.
